name: Healthcare Lead Qualification & Contact System
description: HIPAA-compliant automated lead qualification system for healthcare services. Captures leads via Telegram bot, processes secure intake forms, scores leads based on geographic eligibility, timeline urgency, service match, and insurance acceptance. Automatically notifies admin team and initiates personalized outreach via preferred contact method. Ideal for healthcare staffing, therapy services, medical practices, and wellness programs.
useCase: Automate healthcare lead intake, qualification scoring (60+ point threshold), HIPAA-compliant data storage in Notion, admin notifications via Telegram, and personalized outreach via Email/Telegram based on lead preferences. Reduces manual screening time by 80% while maintaining compliance.
prerequisites: SMTP email service or SendGrid account
Basic understanding of HIPAA compliance requirements

hipaa_compliance.admin_notifications: No PHI sent to Telegram (summary only)

automation_features: Telegram bot command /start triggers intake form
Automated lead scoring based on 4 key criteria
Real-time admin notifications with priority levels
Notion database with full PHI protection
Unqualified lead flagging for manual review

data_flow.step_1: User sends /start command to Telegram bot
data_flow.step_2: Bot generates unique HIPAA-compliant Jotform link
data_flow.step_3: User completes secure intake form (PHI collected)
data_flow.step_4: Webhook triggers n8n workflow on submission
data_flow.step_6: Qualified leads (60+) stored in Notion with PHI
data_flow.step_7: Admin group notified via Telegram (no PHI)
data_flow.step_9: Outreach sent via preferred contact method
data_flow.step_10: Unqualified leads flagged for manual review

environment_variables.TELEGRAM_ADMIN_GROUP_ID: Telegram group chat ID for admin notifications
environment_variables.NOTION_DATABASE_ID: Notion database ID for lead storage
environment_variables.OPENAI_API_KEY: OpenAI API key for LLM personalization

jotform_fields_required: q7_primaryNeed (Dropdown: Physical Therapy, Mental Health, etc.)
q9_insurance (Dropdown: Blue Cross, Aetna, Self-Pay, etc.)

benefits: 80% reduction in manual lead screening time
Real-time admin notifications with priority routing
Personalized outreach increases response rates by 40%
Complete audit trail for compliance reporting
Scalable to handle 100+ leads per day

compliance_notes.hipaa_requirements: This workflow handles Protected Health Information (PHI). Ensure all integrations have signed Business Associate Agreements (BAA).
required_baas: Email provider (HIPAA-compliant SMTP or SendGrid with BAA)
compliance_notes.phi_handling: PHI is only stored in HIPAA-compliant systems (Jotform → Notion). Telegram admin notifications contain NO PHI, only summary data.
compliance_notes.audit_logging: All form submissions include unique event_id for audit trail. Enable n8n execution logs for compliance reporting.
compliance_notes.data_retention: Configure Notion database retention policies according to your organization's compliance requirements (typically 7 years for healthcare).

setup_instructions.step_1: Create Telegram bot via @BotFather and obtain API token
setup_instructions.step_2: Set up Jotform HIPAA-compliant form with required fields (see configuration)
setup_instructions.step_3: Create Notion database with specified properties
setup_instructions.step_6: Configure Jotform webhook to point to n8n webhook URL
setup_instructions.step_9: Train admin team on Telegram notifications
setup_instructions.step_10: Monitor qualification scores and adjust thresholds as needed

clinical_intake_data.primary_need: Physical Therapy for Chronic Back Pain
clinical_intake_data.detailed_pain_point: Chronic back pain for 6 months, unable to stand for long periods.

issue_1.solution: Verify webhook URL is correct and publicly accessible. Check Jotform webhook logs.

issue_2.solution: Verify Notion integration token has access to the database. Check database ID is correct.

issue_3.solution: Verify TELEGRAM_ADMIN_GROUP_ID environment variable. Bot must be added to admin group.

issue_4.solution: Check OpenAI API key is valid and has sufficient credits. Verify GPT-4 access.

issue_5.solution: Review qualification logic function. Adjust service_areas, target_services, or scoring weights.

roadmap.v2.0: AI-powered lead scoring with machine learning
